content.detailedDescription: I got up to go to the bathroom around 1:00 am.  i thought, "i should open these venetian blinds a little so that i can see out." (at night i keep all of the blinds shut tight in order to provide another layer of dead air to insulate against the cold coming in.)  as i opened them a crack, there was a very bright orange star hanging nearly at the zenith. i thought, "oh, jupiter."  but then i thought, "jupiter isn't orange like that."  i kept watching to see if the object moved any.  after watching awhile, the brightness decreased and i could see a tiny white triangle of light with small red lights surrounding the edge. the red lights started to cycle around the edge like on the old theater marquees.  this was all very tiny, maybe at the altitude of 10,000 feet.  other than the light show it didn't move out of place for quite awhile.  so i thought if that's all the show i'm gonna get, i'm going back to bed.  (by this time i'm pretty jaded, i have had 8 or  9 other sightings starting about 10 years ago.)  when i got in bed i looked up through the open blind toward where the object was located but could not see the object. before i gave up looking, the object sailed gracefully by my window, from left to right, probably at an altitude of less than 1,000 feet and i estimate about one quarter mile from me horizontally.  the apparent size during the fly-by was 3/4 inch held at arms length. i wasn't excited per se because this is old hat with me, but i was grateful to have been invited to see it.  there is no way i would get up to go to the bathroom and think on my own "i think i'll open the blinds..."  it's interesting that none of the ten craft i have spotted in the past ten years is remotely like the others in size, shape or color or behavior.
content.summary: Bright orange star faded and you could see a triangular, silver-white craft with sequential red lights circling the edge of the triangle. was hovering at about 10,000 ft. later descended and went by my window at under 1000 ft.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke at 5am to go work.I am on dayshift this week. i have habit of looking out window when i wake. after alarm rang,i stood amd looked out window, i then saw lights flashing in sky above my shed. i observed a craft moving toward house with white blue rectangular lights flashing randomly.2 front,2 left 2 right and 2 rear. a space seperated each pair of rectangulat lights greater then size of each light.The lights had a grid pattern. it move slowly and silently till it moved out of sight from my window. i yelled to my wife get a camera then said forget it, too late,and grabbed my clothes and ran to kitchen and dressed, by the time i opened door and ran out to porch, i observed craft had passed neighbors house and decended, i saw top of craft which was black looking and observed a red light at rear and light on left. it then went out of sight.
made coffee and went to work
content.summary: Observed craft that floated overhead

content.detailedDescription: On feb.13th at 9pm six of us were outside.We just so happened to look up at the sky and seen this bright object hovering down and sitting above the house acroos the street from my house.It then started to move to the right and wjen this object got to the middle of the syreet it just hovered and stayed in the same place around 15 to 20 minutes.Where i live theyre hardly no ligjts on the streets and whete this huge object was hovering at had no light what so ever and was very dark making it very easy to srr becausr, it was very bright and large in  size. by the way i live is in florida and the small city on the west coast named north port. after watching this object for i would guess anout 20 minutes we noticed this red light to describe it to you it was like an ord or something of that nature.Anyways we seen this red tiny ball like an ord shoot out of it and it went in the direction torwards the left of it.And it just vanished into the air. it was traveling at a very fast speed and as soon as we seen it this red ord ligjt thing vanished as fast as it appeared! then about a minute or two this object  started to move down the street as if it wasdjyst srolli.G through  the neighborhood. since this object was up in the air it was really hard to see its size but, we estimated that it had to be  bigger than 6 or more large houses! as we watched this object move down the street it turned in such a sharp mannor that not even a car cam turn that sharply. and pretty soon this object was out of our vision. now every nigjt since then ive seen this object in the sky just hovering in the same place every night after seening the object i just eplained to you. i used a telescope to veiw this object thay appears to the  naked eye to look just as if it were a star. but veiwing it with a telescope you can clearly see that it has red and blue ligjts that seem to move in the same direction as if were circulating around the object. it is really stange and scary to me to see this object in the sky every night and it has not moved from the same spot all week. it has me thinking and believing that this object might be there during the day to! i would have never even questioned anything about ufos if my own eyes havent seen this object myself!  a lot of scary thoughts have been in  my head since the first night i seen it and i cant help to wonder why is it that there seems to be more and more sighting than ever before.And theres been talks about alien invasions from people up in high places. is it true is something going to happen are we being warned and if this is true how do we or can we even prepare ourselfs for it at all? wake up everyone and look up at the sky above you because, chances are that their up in your skies t. its times to look up and start reporting everything you see and rember uour not alone a lot of people are.Seeing the same objects in thheir skies to!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 of us were outside and seen this object hovering over houses& it moved right in the middle of the street! u could see the out line of the object and it wbas moving  slow.Every night it returns u can see it in the sky.Red blue lights move around it.

content.detailedDescription: I don'tknow if anyone else has seen this; it seems to appear every coupleof years and i look for it...It first appears to be a bright star but then it starts pulsating and moving in different directions; tonight i got home after dark and walked across the road to get my mail i noticed it in the distance above the tree line.By the time i got into the house it had moved a distance..As i watched it from the window it just disappeared like someone turned out a light..I do think it was close enough that if it had been a plane i would have heard the engine..Has anyone else seen this???
content.summary: Bright light disappears quickly

content.detailedDescription: Hello, sorry but my english is not good even, but i try to explain this event, i see in the sky two rainbow take photos and video with my cell phone this phenomenon that i thought it was curious, then at home when watching it the videos i saw in the more small an object moving, not is that it is, i hope that you can tell me that it is.
content.summary: I can see some thing in the sky when i wach the video

content.detailedDescription:
yesterday 2/16/12  my roommate and myself were outside around 7pm looking at the sky and stars as we normally due since last summer when we witnessed another sighting and was interviewed by the local new 10 crew.
    we have been noticing blinking star like things showing up sometimes in the sky where there was nothing in that location the night before and sometimes we would see more than one making a triangular type shape, blinking, shooting up into the air, or just all the lights would just turn off at the same time and disappear. we bought a amateur telescope and got interested in the stellarium space software so that if we did see something we could check the location and see if it was something that was supposed to be there or not.
   we saw a circle of light and a faint sound and we looked up and my roommate took out his cheap metro pcs samsung phone so he could try to get a better look at what it was and told me it looked like some kind of helicopter.  we do get the life flight helicopters and the police dept helicopters overhead quite a bit...But this was one i had never seen before and as i said there were lights that made a circle on the helicopter...Which i have never seen before.
   right about that time my roommate panned to the left and called me over to look at his screen, and on the screen i could see 1 light come on and then turn off...Then another one turned on and they 1 by 1 turned on and off, then another one turned on and it made kind of a v shape and they stayed on...At that point another light came on but not as bright...After that other ones showed up darting side to side around the others and then would shoot straight up into the air and disappear.
   he was able to get some good pics and we have those avail to send to you...I am a paranormal investigator myself and am very aware that there are many things that happen in our sky's at night which causes me to pay attention and over the years i have witnessed many different ufo's but this is actually the 2nd time in this location that i have witnessed one. the last one i found out later that other people had also witnessed the other one and had reported it as well. i know the importance of evidence in the paranormal world which is why we tried to get whatever pics we could (even though it is not a high grade cell phone camera) in order to be able to show proof of what we saw.
  please feel free to contact me if you need any additional information.
content.summary: I saw multiple orb type glowing lights and got photos

content.detailedDescription: I saw three orange-red glowing orbs, about a half mile off on the eastern horizon.. maybe 500 feet up. they were moving in patterns around eachother sort of like when you are mixing cups around on the table with a ball onder one of them.. kind of a figure eight pattern with three orbs. they would also move and then stop and hover for a while in other patterns. this lasted for only a few minutes and then they faded away. they did not fly off... they just dimmed out and were gone. i had a couple people with me when i saw this, but at this time none of us had a camera.
content.summary: 3 orange-red orbs

content.detailedDescription: I saw three orange-red glowing orbs, about a half mile off on the eastern horizon.. maybe 500 feet up. they were moving in patterns around eachother sort of like when you are mixing cups around on the table with a ball onder one of them.. kind of a figure eight pattern with three orbs. they would also move and then stop and hover for a while in other patterns. this lasted for only a few minutes and then they faded away. they did not fly off... they just dimmed out and were gone. i had a couple people with me when i saw this, but at this time none of us had a camera.
content.summary: 3 orange-red orbs

content.detailedDescription: my family and i were in the living room with windows facing the north. it was about nine or a little after in the night. my eye was caught by a bright light coming through the slits in the blinds. i went outside and saw it was a sphere about as tall as high tower would be. i do know there are no towers in that direction. the light was round in shape,large and brighter than most stars i have seen. it was yellow orange and looked fiery in the center, like you could see inside of it if you were closer. my daughters and i were all viewing it. then after a minute of complete stillness and hovering it rose up slowly. no noise. with a faint whir it changed into a craft.On the underbelly it it had circle two crescent shapes coming into each other. one side was blue light and the other was red of the crescent shapes. there was also more faint white smaller light on the underbelly. we were mystified about the whole event.It glided slowly and  quietly over our neighborhood towards the south. my daughter noted that it was triangle shaped with a tail.One thing to note would be when we first saw the ball of light there were strange bird noises for under it on the next street over.. i don't know if they were associated but it seemed they were in reaction,response or apart of it. i then ran through the house to the front and saw it disappear into the distance.
content.summary: Bright sphere of fire light morphs into large craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was 5 and i woke up in the middle of the night i saw two beings they looked at me i tried to act asleep but they walked over to me waved a object of some sort at my face and i couldnt move the only other thing i remember is lights and a scar on my arm
content.summary: Happend when i was 5. 2 beings were in my parents room

content.detailedDescription:
In route to dinner, and friend and i witnessed a strange formation of lights out of our car window flying over the buildings. at first i thought it was a meteor or satelite breaking up, but after we stopped the car we realized it was something different all together.  a formation of orange centered orbs with a red aura were flying in a formation over old san juan from the north east towards the south west over the mountains. there were over 100 objects flying at the same speed stretching over a mile. the formation was formed of three orbs, in a triangle pattern, with the right wing mate trailing slightly behind the other two. the preceding groups followed the same flight pattern. when we stopped and leaned out the window to take a few pictures we noticed they made zero noise of any kind. the air speed of the objects was very slow,  to slow to be any flying object i know of. the lights did not flicker in any way and the cloud cover was above them. with the city lights reflecting off of the cloud ceiling, i could determine there was not a craft with running lights, but only the orbs alone were emitting the light. after watching for about five minutes, i was reminded we were late for a dinner reservation. 

at this point, looking back on the experience, i wish i had stayed longer to take more pictures and perhaps even a video. they were really quite beautiful. i'll never forget it.
content.summary: Valentines day sighting in old san juan of over 100 red/orange orbs flying in formation towards the mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
In route to dinner, and friend and i witnessed a strange formation of lights out of our car window flying over the buildings. at first i thought it was a meteor or satelite breaking up, but after we stopped the car we realized it was something different all together.  a formation of orange centered orbs with a red aura were flying in a formation over old san juan from the north east towards the south west over the mountains. there were over 100 objects flying at the same speed stretching over a mile. the formation was formed of three orbs, in a triangle pattern, with the right wing mate trailing slightly behind the other two. the preceding groups followed the same flight pattern. when we stopped and leaned out the window to take a few pictures we noticed they made zero noise of any kind. the air speed of the objects was very slow,  to slow to be any flying object i know of. the lights did not flicker in any way and the cloud cover was above them. with the city lights reflecting off of the cloud ceiling, i could determine there was not a craft with running lights, but only the orbs alone were emitting the light. after watching for about five minutes, i was reminded we were late for a dinner reservation. 

at this point, looking back on the experience, i wish i had stayed longer to take more pictures and perhaps even a video. they were really quite beautiful. i'll never forget it.
content.summary: Valentines day sighting in old san juan of over 100 red/orange orbs flying in formation towards the mountains.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from 7springs resort approximately at 7:15 on route 982 when i witnessed 3 red ligts that formed a huge triangle.  thought it was a tower at first.  object was hovering over head but seemed to be following me.  too slow to be an airplane.  it slowly vanished out of sight.  no sound.  i'm pretty sure a cessna or some small plane witnessed it as well.  possibly plane was departing nearby arnold palmer regional airport
content.summary: Saw three red lights hovering above me while driving.  looked like a huge triangle. seemed to be following me

content.detailedDescription: It was august 30th 2011 around 7:30pm in the city of houston,tx when i encountered this event that was truly unbelieveable but very true. i was at work when we had just started up our product on [jacketing #2] which is linepipe that we extrude a plastic jacket over it's surface in order to protect it from the elements when putting the pipe into the ground. the process requires that we lead the pipe outside and attach it to a wooden shipping spool so my job is a indoor outdoor job. after the process was started and everything seemed to be in order, speed adjustment, paper work and etc, etc...,  i walked back outside and got about 20 ft from the spool controls just inside the roll up door when a reflection right above me drew my attention straight up and into a seemingly low cloud pattern overhead. the object overhead was very bright and it caused me to look away at first because it hurt my eyes and then i looked right into it inspite of the brightness and discomfort. it reflected as if the sun's light was bouncing off of it but at first glance i would have mistaken it for the sun. as i looked right at it i could see that the surface appeared to be moving as if i was looking at a fixed object behind a waterfall. i started yelling for someone to look and turned to my co worker robert who was at the controls right inside the roll up door and he came from behind the controls and look upand he looked up and yelled what is that!!!  as i continued to look at it from where i was standing it seemed to power down some of it's brightness on the bottom and now appeared to me to take on the color of solid white because i no longer felt as uncomfortable as before looking at it and that's when i realized that it was now moving away and getting smaller.  that's when i yelled at my team leader oscar who was down at the other jacketing building [jacketing #1] to look up and out. i also yelled for our new jacketing personnel mona to look!!!  the object moved at an incredible high rate of speed across the sky towards the setting of the sun and out keeping it's brightness until it could no longer to seen, as if it was leaving the earth. even calls made to various people seem to hit dead ends.
content.summary: A very reflective object as if it was a giant mirror casting light over head in a low cloud pattern

content.detailedDescription: I live in jesup ga. 20 miles outside of ft. stewart military base. on febuary 7, 2012 my son and i heard jets from inside our home around 2:00 p.M. they were very loud and i could tell by the sound unusually low. my son and i went outside to see the jets. we observed them flying in a circular formation. they stayed within about a three mile circular pattern of our home. we continued to watch them for appoximatly an hour and seventeen minutes. during this time my son and i took some pictures to show my wife. i didnt realize untill later i had captured on camera an object near the jet. perhaps it was moving too fast for the naked eye to see. it is blurry compared to the f-16 but definitly was there. i only wish i would have had a better camera than my camera phone, however it is still easily seen due to flying so low.This is my first sighting of such an unusual event and thought that i should share it.
content.summary: F-16 jets following or warning ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work northbound on pacific coast highway in laguna beach, california around 4:20 p.M. on a clear sunny day with no clouds anywhere around for miles in the sky when all of sudden i look out over the pacific ocean and see this small odd looking piece of cloud appearing in the sky over the ocean near santa catalina island.  as i was driving i started staring at it because it just seemed very odd that a small cloud like this would appear without any other clouds around it.  it was white in color like most clouds are but that's where the similarities end.  the shape of it was not smooth or round like normal clouds but more circular and popcorn shaped with rugged edges, almost like the remnants of a supernova explosion in space.  as i kept driving for a few minutes it started to disappear, then appear, then completely disappear within minutes!  i knew this could not be a natural cloud because normal clouds do not appear and disappear like this within minutes.  because i had seen video on the web of similar "clouds" appearing in a clear blue sky out of nowhere and then disappear, i came to the conclusion that it could possibly be a ufo "hiding" itself to humans as a normal cloud but this very observant human was not deceived.  i really don't know what else it could be.
content.summary: Small white puffs of cloud appearing, disappearing in cloudless sky

content.detailedDescription: i witnessed a coupled of objects that all of a sudden appeared in my vision in a north to northwesterly direction. this occurence lasted about two to three minutes. these objects appeared to be linked by some sort of body between the lights that i witnessed. these same lights at one point did what i would call a wagging motion similar to what a military pilot would do as a salute to fallen hero, but this was not as pronounced as whatr what we normally see. i would really like to find out what i saw a few nights ago, but that might not be possible as our own government doesn't beleive its own people anymore. please help older veteran if you can??
content.summary: Seen object that i cannot explain, but have relative military spotting experience, and am puzzled none the less.

content.detailedDescription: i witnessed a coupled of objects that all of a sudden appeared in my vision in a north to northwesterly direction. this occurence lasted about two to three minutes. these objects appeared to be linked by some sort of body between the lights that i witnessed. these same lights at one point did what i would call a wagging motion similar to what a military pilot would do as a salute to fallen hero, but this was not as pronounced as whatr what we normally see. i would really like to find out what i saw a few nights ago, but that might not be possible as our own government doesnt beleive its own people anymore. please help older veteran if you can??

content.detailedDescription: i was returning home one evening when i exited my truck i heard a low humming noise. i looked up and above me about 100 ft off the ground was this object. i wanted to get a camera but i knew that my battery was dead in the camera so i decided to observe the object and try to remember all that i saw.  as i looked at the object it began to move slowly approximately 5-10 mph. the object was three octagonal objects connected in a row. each was thirty feet in diameter and was emitting a light from inside lighting up the surface as like you could see through it. not transparent but a light tan skin-like surface. each octagonal surface was outlined to the center to each point of the octagon. no markings or writing on the surface. the object slowly moved above me for about 300 ft, then went to a point i could only see as it moved off to about 1/4 mile away and then acended to about 1500 ft and faced me so i could see all three objects. the objects then seperated slowly to about 100ft apart. the objects then departed at an incredible rate of speed. the two end ones went horizontal away form the center one. the center one went straght up out of sight in a matter of one to two seconds. the sky was clear at the time of the sighting and no fog. i do not know what the object was and i have never seen anything anywhere like it. i don't take drugs or drink. i am not crazy  and i am educated.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Three octagonal objects hoovering at 100 ft then moving at least 1/4 mile then seperating then speed off at unknown speed

content.detailedDescription: Coming home saw very bright orange light in the sky cought mt attention, pulled into driveway and took pic w/ my phone , there were no blinking strobes like a aircraft would have, turned off vehicle to see if i could here anything and there was no noise omitted, about that time it was going over the house , i ran inside to the back deck and could no longer observe.
content.summary: Orange glowing object observed in sky

content.detailedDescription: I had taken my then girlfriend out to the movie's to see a christmas vacation by national lampoon, we left the movie and made it back to her place, as i stood on waiting for her to find her keys i saw an object on my right that was a dull orange in color and was a single point of light, then separated into 5 points of light that flew in a v formation then clustered close together and flew away at a very rapid speed untill i couldn't see it anymore, all of this took place in less than 10 minutes. as it was flying away she turned and saw it and asked what it was and i told her i didn't know, that's my full account of what i saw now can somebody tell me what i saw please?....
content.summary: One single point of light flying at a nice pace then broke into five points then in to a v shape before clustering.

content.detailedDescription: I alway look in the sky almost every night because my wife said she had seen a ufo about 200 feet high back in nov 2011 around our neighborhood and a bigger one in july 2005.  i finally seen this object on 2/14/12 at 8 pm.  i got my video camera out to record but out of battery but i used my benocular to watch it for 15 minutes.  the object seem to hoover above the navy base in seal beach.  i saw the object moving toward catalina island but then it came back to the same position by navy base again.  i look out my window again the next night around 8 pm and there the object again and film it for 11 minutes and then it took off.  i look at the same spot on 2/16/12 at 7 pm and saw the object much closer within a mile.  i took my camera out and film it.  all of a sudden a hear a loud "hum" for 15 second which heard my ear when i was filming the object.  it got closer to my house but then it move back further away.  i can see airplane flying over the object which mean the object is pretty low.  the object is still can be seen right at this minute while i am typing my story.  if anyone live in orange county, please let me know what this object is.
content.summary: Objects been around for the passed 3 day now.

content.detailedDescription: Walking dog, snow falling, no wind, very bright light in sky over the rooftop of neighbouring houses.  it was stationary when i first noticed it.  it then ascended then moved off towards the west.
content.summary: Bright light in sky in our neighbourhood

content.detailedDescription:
It was a little after 8pm on a sunday night and i was coming back from a dinner i had with my son, his wife and their 6 year old daughter.  we had just left a musical concert at a local church.  
i was driving home on a hill top facing north toward lake eufaula at night and saw a camouflaged oval disk shape with rotating lights moving east across the lake and again moving west. the rotating lights were toward the bottom of the craft.  it appeared as if the outside of the craft had reflectors to be the same as the darkness but the edges were visible and the rotating lights were more visible.  there may have been more than one craft of similar appearance because it went behind some trees and i stopped on the road and turned my lights off to get a better look as there were no street lights or traffic where i was and a craft came back in the opposite direction.  i thought because light was coming out of the bottom of the craft it was looking for something.
this has been very alarming because something this big should have made big news.  i was looking over the city of eufaula and the craft seemed to be one third to one fourth the size of the entire town.  i have tried to figure out how far it was but it is impossible to know because it was dark.  this would allow me to figure how big it was.
the next morning a heavy fog was over eufaula and much of east central oklahoma.  this heavy fog has lasted throughout the week especially at night and early mornings.
i have searched the internet to see if others have had a similar experience in this area to no avail.
content.summary: Driving toward lake eufaula and saw an oval disk shape camouflaged with rotating lights moving east across the lake and again moving west.

content.detailedDescription:
on february 16, 2012 thursday at approximately 4:40 am est. i observed through my security camera system a massive star-like object that descended horizontally from a 45 degree angle in the night sky and as it did it divided itself into 8 other smaller oval shaped star-like objects glowing with the same intensity and pulsating as they descended so low on the east due east that were no longer in my security camera system line of sight. 

    i have been in the military and in the civilian law enforcement for over 10 years combined and i have never seen a drop of flares that would perform as these lights did. if it was a night-op from the near by air force base performing a drop on some experimental flares, can anyone inform of such event? thank you. 

retired army infantryman and current law enforcement officer.
content.summary: Massive starlike object decended and divided itself into 8 smaller oval objects in homestead.
